vsParam:
Boo-hoo... Why would Bergamot Sensei
give us so many assignments?

Although report writing is tedious, it can still be done.
Let's work together to complete the assignments.

That's right. I'm confident to complete them with you
guys here... Ah? Isn't that Nelke?

Wow, so many books!
Are you going to read them all!?

Yes. My world doesn't have some of these books.
They are really very interesting!

I get to spend a whole day amid books.
It's like a dream come true!

I can stay here from dawn to dusk...
No, I even want to live here!
Um, please be quiet in the library...
It's rare to see you get so happy!

Ah, sorry!
I got too excited...

Really... Ah! Look how excited I am.
This is the library. I should keep it down...

Ho ho. I understand your feeling.
I'd get excited too when I run into interesting articles.

Uh, you also get excited over books!
Anyway, what brings you all to the library?

We are here to look for references to complete our
reports. Sensei gave us too many assignments.

Yeah.
It's tiring just to look for references...

Report... Um, if you don't mind,
can I help with it?

Really!? You are a big help!
Let's work together. I'm sure we can finish them soon!

Um, the book [px] is looking for...
Ah, this book...
Ah, this book is so old and shabby...

Yeah, the cover is worn-out.
It must be read by many people...

This book is deeply loved by everyone.
It'll be amazing if we can repair it...

You are right... But it's severely damaged. I'm afraid
that it can't be repaired with conventional means...

Hmm... It's a pity to leave it like that.
Let's do something about it, [px]!

Wow... Check it out. It's like a new book now!
The credit is all yours, [px].

Ha ha.
Nelke, you really cherish books.

Yes. Books carry precious experience and knowledge
of our ancestors. How can we not cherish them...

Uh, it occurs to me...
How about transferring you to the Academy?
Eh? Me... tran-transferring to the Academy!?

Yeah. Since you love reading books so much,
and yearn for knowledge...

Wouldn't it be better if you become a member of the
Academy officially and receive a formal education?

Having classes in such an amazing school...
Can I really become a student here?

If, if... that's possible,
please make me a student here!

Yeah, it's settled! Let's pay a visit to the headmaster
and see if this could work!
